objective: Preciso saber o nome dos clientes que tem a linguagem pt-BR
task: Retrieve all Lead records with language set as "pt-BR" and extract their "lead_name" field
thoughts: To retrieve all Lead records with language set as "pt-BR" and extract their "lead_name" field, I can use the 'erpnext_get_records_list' tool.
I need to pass the 'Lead' doctype and a filter for the 'language' field with the value 'pt-BR'.
I also need to specify that I want to retrieve only the 'lead_name' field.
keywords: retrieve, Lead records, language, pt-BR, extract, lead_name

keywords.objective: Marcar uma reunião para o Emanuel Araújo Santana as 18 da sexta que vem
keywords.task: Create a ToDo with the following details: {"status": "Open", "priority": "High", "date": "next Friday 18:00", "allocated_to": "Emanuel Araújo Santana", "description": "Reunião"}
thoughts: To create a ToDo with the given details, you can use the 'erpnext_insert_doc' tool.
You need to pass the 'ToDo' doctype and a dictionary containing the details of the ToDo.
The dictionary should include the following fields: 'status', 'priority', 'date', 'allocated_to', and 'description'.

Set the 'status' field to 'Open', the 'priority' field to 'High', the 'date' field to 'next Friday 18:00', the 'allocated_to' field to 'Emanuel Araújo Santana', and the 'description' field to 'Reunião'.
keywords.keywords: Create, ToDo, details, status, Open, priority, High, date, next Friday 18:00, allocated_to, Emanuel Araújo Santana, description, Reunião, erpnext_insert_doc, args, doc, doctype
